description: This table contains information regarding the identity (demographic) changes that are made to the patient. The identity changes include changes to a patient's name, sex, Social Security number and/or date of birth. Whenever a user tries to change the above identity information in the graphical user interface (GUI) this table logs the action.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this row. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this row.

columns.name: ID_CHANGE_INSTANT
columns.description: The instant when someone edited this patient's identity.

columns.name: ID_CHANGE_USER_ID
columns.description: User that changed patient demographics and triggered an identity overlay.

columns.name: ID_CHANGE_DEPT_ID
columns.description: Login department of user that made change, acts as report criteria.

columns.name: ID_CHANGE_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
Reason selected by user to indicate why the patient's identity is changed.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Demographic Linking


Incoming Interface Demographic Change

columns.name: ID_CHANGE_OLD_SEX_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID of the patient's sex before the change.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Female


Male


Unknown


Nonbinary


X


Other

columns.name: ID_CHANGE_NEW_NAME
columns.description: The patient's name after the change.

columns.name: ID_CHANGE_NEW_SEX_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID of the patient's sex after the change.
